languages.text: {n}Дикое сине-зеленое сияние угасает во взгляде техножреца. Он опускает руку, и механика на вас перестает погибать от неведомой пагубы.{/n} "Конвой получил приказ встретить вас. Более он нефункционален, потому предлагаю продолжить продвижение к точке рандеву с солдатами губернатора совместно". {n}Техножрец решительно устремляет взор вперед, {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}щупальца-мехадендриты{/g} грациозно вздымаются вокруг его сгорбленной фигуры, подсвеченной костром из догорающих останков машины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Человек в алом кланяется почтительно, но без обычной для простолюдинов поспешности. {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Щупальца-мехадендриты{/g} грациозно распускаются веером вокруг его сгорбленной фигуры.{/n} "Право коммуницировать с персоной столь высокого статуса — честь для меня".

languages.text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дикое сине-зеленое сияние угасает во взгляде техножреца. Он опускает руку, и механика на вас перестает погибать от неведомой пагубы.{/n} "Конвой получил приказ встретить вас. Более он нефункционален, потому предлагаю продолжить продвижение к точке рандеву с солдатами губернатора совместно". {n}Техножрец решительно устремляет взор вперед, {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}щупальца-мехадендриты{/g} грациозно вздымаются вокруг его сгорбленной фигуры, подсвеченной костром из догорающих останков машины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

{n}The man in crimson bows respectfully but without haste typical for commoners. His {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rise gracefully around his hunched figure.{/n} "It is an honour to have the right to communicate with a figure of such high status."

{n}The man in crimson bows respectfully but without the haste typical of commoners. His {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rise gracefully around his hunched figure.{/n} "It is an honour to have the right to communicate with a figure of such high status."

{n}The man in crimson bows respectfully but without the haste typical of commoners. His {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rise gracefully around his hunched figure.{/n} "It is an honour to have the right to communicate with a figure of such high status."

{n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

{n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫目光中充满威胁意味的蓝绿色光芒逐渐黯淡下来。他放下了手臂，你的机械装置的故障也随之消失。{/n}“护卫队收到了与你会合的命令，但护卫队已经失去了效用。因此，我建议继续前进，与总督的士兵会合。”{n}技术神甫坚定地凝视着前方，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}在驼背的身躯周围优雅地飘舞着，机器残骸散发的阴燃火焰照亮了他的身躯。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身穿深红色长袍的人恭敬地向你鞠了一躬，但他的动作并不像普通人一样匆忙。他的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}优雅地环绕在他驼背的身躯四周。{/n}“你的身份已经得到了确认。”

languages.text: {n}El amenazar brillo verde azulado se esfuma de la mirada del tecnosacerdote. Baja el brazo y las averías abandonan tu equipo.{/n} «El convoy recibió instrucciones de reunirse con usted. Puesto que ya no está operativo, propongo que avancemos hasta el punto de reunión con los soldados del gobernador». {n}El tecnosacerdote mira decidido hacia delante, con los {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}tentáculos de su mecadendrita{/g} elevándose grácilmente en torno a su encorvado cuerpo iluminado por los ardientes restos de la máquina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre de carmesí hace una respetuosa reverencia, pero sin la prisa característica de los plebeyos. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}apéndices de mecadendrita{/g} se alzan con elegancia alrededor de su figura encorvada.{/n} «Su posición queda reconocida».

languages.text: {n}技術司祭の威嚇的な青緑色の光が消えていく。彼が腕を下げると、あなたの機器の誤作動が直る。{/n}「輸送隊は、あなたと合流するように命令を受けた。しかし、もう機能していないため、このまま総督の兵たちとの合流地点まで前進することを提案します」{n}技術司祭は、毅然と前方を見つめる。彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は燃え盛るマシンの残骸から上がる炎に照らされながら、彼の猫背に優雅に覆いかぶさっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭の威嚇的な青緑色の光が消えていく。彼が腕を下げると、あなたの機器の誤作動が直る。{/n}「輸送隊は、あなたと合流するように命令を受けた。しかし、もう機能していないので、このまま総督の兵たちとの合流地点まで前進することを提案します」{n}技術司祭は、毅然と前方を見つめる。彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は燃え盛るマシンの残骸の炎に照らされながら、彼の猫背を優雅に覆いかぶさっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lueur menaçante turquoise qui animait le regard du technoprêtre se dissipe. Il baisse le bras et votre équipement cesse aussitôt de dérailler.{/n} « Le convoi a reçu l'ordre de se porter à votre rencontre. Attendu qu'il est à présent hors d'usage, je vous invite à poursuivre notre chemin en direction du point de rendez-vous avec les soldats du gouverneur. » {n}Le technoprêtre regarde droit devant lui d'un air déterminé et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} s'élèvent gracieusement autour de son corps penché, éclairé par les flammes qui rongent les restes encore fumants de la machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme en rouge s'incline avec respect, mais sans la hâte habituelle des gens du peuple. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} s'élèvent gracieusement autour de son corps penché.{/n} « Votre statut est bien pris en compte. »

languages.text: {n}Das bedrohliche blaugrüne Leuchten im Blick des Techpriesters erlischt. Er senkt den Arm, und die Fehlfunktion deiner Ausrüstung endet.{/n} "Der Konvoi hat den Befehl erhalten, Euch zu treffen. Er hat seine Funktionsfähigkeit verloren, daher schlage ich vor, dass wir zu dem Treffpunkt mit den Soldaten des Gouverneurs vorrücken." {n}Der Techpriester starrt resolut geradeaus. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit-Tentakeln{/g} erheben sich anmutig über seine buckelige Gestalt, die von den Flammen der qualmenden Überreste der Maschine erhellt wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann in Rot verbeugt sich respektvoll, aber ohne die typische Hast der Bürgerlichen. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten-Tentakel{/g} erheben sich elegant um seine gebeugte Gestalt.{/n} "Euer Status ist bestätigt."

languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his mechadendrite tentacles rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in bakışlarındaki tehditkâr mavi yeşil parıltı kayboluyor. Kolunu indirmesiyle beraber teçhizatın da teklemeyi bırakıyor.{/n} "Konvoy, sizinle buluşma emri aldı lakin işlevselliğini yitirdi. Bu nedenle önerim, valinin askerleriyle buluşma noktasına ilerlemeye devam etmemizdir." {n}Tekno Rahip kararlılıkla ileriye bakıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mekadentrit dokunaçları{/g}, makinenin için için yanan kalıntılarının alevleriyle aydınlanan kambur vücudunun çevresinde zarifçe yükseliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The menacing blue-green glow fades in the Tech-Priest's gaze. He lowers his arm, and your equipment ceases to malfunction.{/n} "The convoy received an order to meet you. It is no longer functional, therefore I propose that we continue to advance to the rendezvous point with the governor's soldiers." {n}The Tech-Priest stares resolutely forward, his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite tentacles{/g} rising gracefully around his hunched figure, which is illuminated by the flames of the smouldering remains of the machine.{/n}

Kolunu indirmesiyle beraber teçhizatın da teklemeyi bırakıyor.{/n} "Konvoy, sizinle buluşma emri aldı lakin işlevselliğini yitirdi. Bu nedenle önerim, valinin askerleriyle buluşma noktasına ilerlemeye devam etmemizdir." {n}Tekno Rahip kararlılıkla ileriye bakıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mekadentrit dokunaçları{/g}, makinenin için için yanan kalıntılarının alevleriyle aydınlanan kambur vücudunun çevresinde zarifçe yükseliyor.{/n}
